definition: to be secretly in love with
variant of 暗[an4]
to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]
dark/gloomy/hidden/secret/muddled/obscure/in the dark
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: After years of Ross mooning over Rachel, she finally found out that he was in love with her.
sentences.chinese: 在罗斯暗恋瑞秋多年后，这个傻丫头终于发现了。

sentences.english: The peach is a self-destruct, is a great sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 暗恋是一种自毁，是一种伟大的牺牲。

sentences.english: Like of the missing not sweet, only long blunt painful.
sentences.chinese: 暗恋的思念没有甜蜜，只有悠长的钝痛。

sentences.english: In her journal, Shannon wrote about her secret crush on Jeremy.
sentences.chinese: 夏侬在日记里写下她对杰若米的暗恋。

sentences.english: Ham-colored world, is Secret Love Secret Love the main reason for the choice.
sentences.chinese: 煺色的世界，是暗恋着选择暗恋的主要原因。

sentences.english: Ham-colored world, is Secret Love Secret Love the main reason for the choice.
sentences.chinese: 煺色的世界，是暗恋着选择暗恋的主要原因。

sentences.english: Both already have a love, or in the unrequited love, crush the people.
sentences.chinese: 无论是已经拥有了爱情，还是处于单恋，暗恋中的人。

sentences.english: Ji-hae and Soo-kyoung are attending the same university and both have a crush on Sang-min.
sentences.chinese: 梓希跟秀景是同校大学生，双双暗恋戏剧学会的尚民。

sentences.english: She also secretly admired our new neighbor David.
sentences.chinese: 她还暗恋着我们的新邻居大卫。

sentences.english: Today, I was playing soccer on the opposing team to a girl I really like.
sentences.chinese: 今天我踢足球，暗恋的姑娘在对面那一队。

sentences.english: It's the first time the manager has admitted having such a long-standing interest in the player.
sentences.chinese: 这事经理第一次承认自己对这名球员暗恋已久。

sentences.english: Junior Peach object, already married becomes someone's wife.
sentences.chinese: 少年暗恋对象，早已嫁作人妇。

sentences.english: I remember this one time when I had a crush on this girl.
sentences.chinese: 我记得这次当我暗恋上这个女孩的时候。

sentences.english: A boy loves a girl hiddly.
sentences.chinese: 小伙子暗恋着一个女孩。

sentences.english: You like me for what, a year, you didn't do anything about it.
sentences.chinese: 你暗恋我多久了？一年，结果你一个屁也没放。

definition: unrequited love/one-sided love
one-sided lovesickness/unrequited longing
to announce publicly/to explain oneself/to reveal one's feelings/to confess/to declare one's love
first love
to explain oneself/to express/to reveal one's thoughts or feelings/declaration/confession
first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
to adore/to admire
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
lit. green plums and hobby-horse (idiom)/fig. innocent children's games/childhood sweethearts/a couple who grew up as childhood friends
pure and innocent/a pure heart
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to court/to go steady/to be dating
to be in the same class/to be in the same squad/classmate
to love dearly
to imagine that one's love is reciprocated/to shower affection on an uninterested party
the prettiest girl in the class
